> <OLD>
>
> There was a shrug from WHEELIE, "how that went, i can't say, but I don't
> think he would quite work that way.  Easy to anger, easy to bait, not caring
> for those he can relate.  Blame others he does for his loss of control, not
> care how he got into his hole.  Care for him not, I know I do, but think he
> is not ready to go unlike you."
>
> Sighing, "But know what is up with them I do not, out in the boonies like
> time forgot.  I think that you are not ready to go, until you finish repairs
> I know.  So, here I am afraid you will stay.  We both will hate it quite
> much this way.  I am ready to go, but will leave it to you, so say so."

<NEW>

RODIMUS just looked at WHEELIE for a long moment, a war or desire vs
reality being fought on his face as he slowly came to the harsh
reality that he could not follow WHEELIE, at least not yet.

Finally he nodded. "I understand. I cannot go with you, but we need to
know what and why the Dinobots are acting so strangely."

RODIMUS reached up to his shoulder and pulled off what looked to be
one of the smaller insignia, one that was similar to the Autobot but a
little different, more like GRIMLOCK's face. "This is his old Dynobot
badge. One that we had crafted together many vorns ago." Rodimus said.
"I don't know what has happened to Grimlock, but if there is anything
left of him in there, perhaps this will remind him of who is was, and
who he could still be."

RODIMUS held it out to WHEELIE, "If there is a way to still save him,
he deserves that chance."

(TAG)

Preston
